Leiston Mobile Library Route 9

Contact us:

Manager: Rob Alcraft and Peter Fiske

Email: help@suffolklibraries.co.uk

Telephone: 01473 351249

Route timetable

Stop Village Location Time
9A Oulton Herivan Gardens 0950 – 1005
9B Corton Wheatacre Drive 1015 – 1030
9C Corton Station Road 1035 – 1055
9D Lound Near pond 1110 – 1125
9E Lound Lound Hall 1130 – 1200
9F Somerleyton Green 1215 – 1235
9G Somerleyton Village Hall 1340 – 1400
9H Blundeston Plough PH 1415 – 1430
9I Oulton Oulton Park 1440 – 1520
9J Wrentham Village Hall 1545 – 1600

Calling every 4 weeks on Tuesdays:

2020: 21 January, 18 February, 17 March, 14 April, 12 May, 9 June, 7 July, 4 August, 1 September, 29 September, 27 October, 24 November, 22 December
